ComicInfo.Series: The Deadly Hands of Kung Fu
ComicInfo.Title: Daughters of the Dragon; The Tiger-Sons Must Die!
ComicInfo.Summary: Colleen's grandfather, Kenji Ozawa, is killed by agents of Emil Vachon. The duo travel to Hong Kong to find Vachon and battle the minions of Vachon's lieutenant, Chung. They discover that Vachon is a major gun-dealer and blow up an arms shipment. But, they are knocked out by the explosion and captured by Chung.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 17:12:31. [Issue ID 30665]
ComicInfo.Inker: Marshall Rogers,Michelle Wrightson,Sonny Trinidad,Michele Brand,Marshall Rogers,Sonny Trinidad,Michele Brand
ComicInfo.Letterer: Irving Watanabe,Karen Mantlo,Marshall Rogers,Jim Novak,Marshall Rogers,Irving Watanabe,Jim Novak,Karen Mantlo
ComicInfo.Teams: Daughters of the Dragon,New York Police Department,Daily Globe,Sons Of The Tiger
